entry.title: https://github.com/ONLYOFFICE/DocumentServer
entry.content: ONLYOFFICE Docs is a free collaborative online office suite comprising viewers and editors for texts, spreadsheets and presentations, forms and PDF, fully compatible with Office Open XML formats: .docx, .xlsx, .pptx and enabling collaborative editing in real time.

entry.title: https://github.com/Steam-Headless/docker-steam-headless
entry.content: A Headless Steam Docker image supporting NVIDIA GPU and accessible via Web UI

entry.title: https://github.com/WhatsApp/proxy
entry.content: This repository contains the WhatsApp proxy implementation for users to host their own proxy infrastructure to connect to WhatsApp for chat (VoIP is not currently supported)

entry.title: https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh
entry.content: A pure Unix shell script implementing ACME client protocol

entry.title: https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm
entry.content: Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

entry.title: https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh
entry.content: üôÉ A delightful community-driven (with 2,400+ contributors) framework for managing your zsh configuration. Includes 300+ optional plugins (rails, git, macOS, hub, docker, homebrew, node, php, python, etc), 140+ themes to spice up your morning, and an auto-update tool that makes it easy to keep up with the latest updates from the community.

entry.title: https://github.com/raspberrypi/rpi-image-gen
entry.content: A tool to generate highly customised software images for Raspberry Pi devices.

entry.title: https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite
entry.content: Bazzite is a custom Fedora Atomic image built with cloud native technology that brings the best of Linux gaming to all of your devices - including your favorite handheld.
